attributes.description: The new Triber has been thoughtfully designed to accommodate comfort and convenience. it features cooled storage space in the centre console, best-in-class passenger cabin space, available in a sub-4m car and unmatched space in all rows with slide and recline 2nd row seats. it also features best-in-class boot space of 625 litres (in life mode) and interior storage of up to 31 litres.

attributes.description: Finance can be arranged. Excludes administration, delivery, and License Registration Fees. 80 Point quality check. Very neat. Tradeins accepted. Test drives welcome. Nationwide delivery. Finance Is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please Come and visit our preowned manager and our business manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylormade deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our bistro. Tradeins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our finance and insurance manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Grand Central Motors Jeep, Fiat Alfa Romeo.

attributes.description: WOW NOW IS YOUR CHANCE TO OWN A FLAGSHIP SUV AT A PRICE OF A VW POLO THE VEHICLE IS VERY SPECIAL INDEED. Absolutely spotless, massive respect goes to the previous owner who has managed to keep her vehicle in exceptional condition FULL SERVICE HISTORY, EVERY SERVICE COMPLETED ON SCHEDULE AND UP TO DATE WITH VW. Storm Grey, Black Leather Upholstery is like new and finished with satin silver RLINE trim. Panoramic Glass Sun Roof, FULL RLINE PACKAGE. The most stunning combination imaginable. Fully loaded with every extra and luxury that VW have to offer including FULL R LINE PACKAGE, PANORAMIC GLASS SUN ROOF, NEW GEN TOUCH SCREEN INFOTAINMENT WITH SAT NAV, FULL SMART PHONE INTERGRATION, OPTICAL CAMERA SYSTEM, REVERSE CAMERA etc etc ELECTRIC ADJUSTABLE AND MEMORY SEATS , HEATED SEATS , MULTIFUNCTION LEATHER STEERING , SD CARD PORT, ELECTRIC TAIL GATE , FRONT AND REAR PDC ,FACTORY FITTED ELECTRIC TOW BAR , AUTO ARMOUR SMASH AND GRAB ETC. IT LOOKS, FEELS, DRIVES LIKE A BRAND NEW VEHICLE .PERFECTLY LOOKED AFTER BY FANATICAL PREVIOUS OWNER. . IMPOSSIBLE TO FIND SUCH A SPECIAL NEW GEN TOUREG WITH COMPREHENSIVE VW SERVICE HISTORY AVAILABLE IN THIS PRICE RANGE A new one like this will now cost close to R2 million. If you are considering buying a similar vehicle then you owe it to yourself to at least come and drive this one before making a decision Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
